oai_dc:dc.dc:title: South Side of Public Square Between 2nd and 3rd Avenue North, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the south side of public square between 2nd and 3rd Avenue North, c.1950s. J.B. Carver Electric Supply, H.G. Hill, Lerman Shoe Co., Grimes Department Store, and Warner Drug Co. are visible. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); H.G. Hill (Nashville, Tenn.);
